title: 5.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a program that generates a random list of 50 integers and sorts it using the bubble sort algorithm. Print out the original list, the sorted list, and the number of iterations it takes to sort the list.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
